thread.title: Ashley Benson Steps Out in a Crop Top After Welcoming Her First Baby – DNyuz
thread.title_full: Ashley Benson Steps Out in a Crop Top After Welcoming Her First Baby – DNyuz

author: Glamour
title: Ashley Benson Steps Out in a Crop Top After Welcoming Her First Baby – DNyuz
text:
Ashley Benson is out and about after welcoming her first child with husband Brandon Davis .
On February 29, the 34-year-old actor confirmed the happy news by posting a photo of her newborn’s hand gripping her finger on her Instagram Story with a simple pink heart emoji. So far, she has not revealed any further information, including the baby’s name, birthday, or gender.
Just a day earlier, the Pretty Little Liars alum was spotted in a Los Angeles parking lot with Davis, a 45-year-old socialite and grandson of a billionaire oil tycoon. Benson first announced their engagement on Instagram Stories in July 2023 after less than a year of dating. According to People , they wed sometime before the start of 2024.
In the new pic from February 28, she can be seen wearing a black bra top layered under an open green and white striped cropped button up. Benson finished off the casual look with a pair of sweatpants, flip-flops, and skinny black sunglasses. As for her hair, Benson is rocking a chic brunette bob, which she debuted on Instagram in February.
Clearly, Ashley Benson is not one for big announcements. She first confirmed the pregnancy back in November by simply showing up to the Babylist showroom in Beverly Hills with her then-fiancé. At the time, Benson appeared perfectly aware and unbothered that she was being photographed and recorded, presumably agreeing to appear in a baby registry shopping video for the brand’s Instagram account. Instagram content
This content can also be viewed on the site it originates from.
A few months later, Benson posed for a topless maternity shoot for the cover of Ladygunn magazine and revealed why she opted to stay quiet at the beginning of her pregnancy journey. “I kept private because being so seen by everyone else, everyone has an opinion,” she said in the interview, which was published in late January. “It’s very lonely and you just feel judged. It’s really hard.”
However, the actor hinted that she was preparing to step back into the spotlight, telling the publication, “And with the birth of my child, the rebirth of my career is going to happen too.” Let’s go!
The post Ashley Benson Steps Out in a Crop Top After Welcoming Her First Baby appeared first on Glamour .
